InsertCreateAssembly.Title: Create Service Assembly
InsertCreateAssembly.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Assembly</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertCreateKit.Title: Create Service Kit
InsertCreateKit.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Kit</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertProvide.Title: Create Service Part
InsertProvide.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Part</uicontrol>, enter a name, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateAssemblyAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Service Assembly and Resulting Product Link
CreateAssemblyAndResultingProduct.ShortH: Creates a Service assembly and a resulting product link.
CreateAssemblyAndResultingProduct.LongHe: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Assembly and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateKitAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Service Kit and Resulting Product Link
CreateKitAndResultingProduct.ShortHelp: Creates a Service kit and a resulting product link
CreateKitAndResultingProduct.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Kit and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateProvideAndResultingProduct.Title: Create Service Part and Resulting Product Link
CreateProvideAndResultingProduct.ShortHe: Creates a Service part and a resulting product link
CreateProvideAndResultingProduct.LongHel: Click <uicontrol>Create Service Part and Resulting Product Link</uicontrol>, enter a name and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
AssignAssembly.Title: Assign Product to Service Assembly
AssignAssembly.ShortHelp: Assigns a product or a part to a Service assembly.
AssignAssembly.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and a Service assembly and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
AssignKit.Title: Assign Product to Service Kit
AssignKit.ShortHelp: Assigns a product or a part to a Service Kit.
AssignKit.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and a Service Kit and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
AssignProvide.Title: Assign Product to Service Part
AssignProvide.ShortHelp: Assigns a product or a part to a Service Part.
AssignProvide.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and a Service Part and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
CreateMfgItemStructure.Title: Create Service Items Structure
CreateMfgItemStructure.ShortHelp:
Creates an SBOM structure from an EBOM structure with a scope link to a product or a part.

This command always create new structure. Consider using Update Sie Items Structure command if structure is partially consumed.
CreateMfgItemStructure.LongHelp: Select a root Service Assembly and click <uicontrol>Create Sie Items Structure</uicontrol>.
UpdateMfgItemStructure.Title: Update Service Items Structure
UpdateMfgItemStructure.ShortHelp: Updates a service item that has a scope link to a product or a part with another revision.
UpdateMfgItemStructure.LongHelp: In the dialog box, select a revision, and click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.
InsertContinuousServiceMaterial.Title: Create Continuous Service Part
InsertContinuousServiceMaterial.ShortHel: Creates a Continuous Service Part with a scope link to a product or a part.
InsertContinuousServiceMaterial.LongHelp: Select a product or a part and click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Service Part and Scope Link</uicontrol> to create a Continuous Service Part with a scope link to a product or a part.
Create Continuous Service Part and Scope Link
Creates a Continuous Service Part with a scope link to a product or a part.
Select a product or a part and click <uicontrol>Create Continuous Service Part and Scope Link</uicontrol> to create a Continuous Service Part with a scope link to a product or a part.
ServiceItems.Title: Service Items View
ServiceItems.ShortHelp: Displays or hides the <wintitle>Service Items</wintitle> view.
